remarks: A polynomial treated as a coefficient function has finitely many nonzero terms.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Mar-2015.)  Obsolete version of ~ mplelsfi as of 25-Jun-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
mplrcl.p $e |- P = ( I mPoly R ) $.
mplrcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` P ) $.
mplelsfi.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
mplelsfi.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. B ) $.
mplelsfi.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. V ) $.
mplelsfiOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( `' F " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) $.
